Hatchan's Sea-Floor Stroll, Chapters 182 to 228, Volumes 20 to 25.


Short Summary


Having escaped from the marine ship where he is held, Hatchan returns to beneath the sea and helps a panda shark. This sets off a series of trades and adventures, culminating in the discovery of a new friend, Camie the mermaid, and the fulfillment of his dream - a takoyaki stand.
